Core.desc: General commands for configuration, info, and diagnostics.

Moderation.desc: Moderation tools, case edits, channel controls, and cleanup.

help.desc: Displays all commands and categories available to you.

ping.desc: Shows how long Helix takes to respond to a message.

prefix.brief: Change or view the bot's prefix.
prefix.desc: Set or check the prefix used for commands in your server.

modlog.brief: Set or view the moderation log channel.
modlog.desc: Defines the channel where Helix will post moderation case logs.

warn.desc: Gives a warning to a member and logs the case.

warns.desc: Shows all warnings a user has received.

clearwarns.desc: Removes all warnings issued to a specific user.

kick.desc: Kicks a member from the server and logs the case.

ban.desc: Bans a user from the server and logs the case.

unban.desc: Unbans a user by ID and logs the case.

mute.desc: Adds the Muted role to a user and logs the case.

unmute.desc: Removes the Muted role from a user and logs the case.

reason.desc: Updates the reason for an existing moderation case.

duration.desc: Sets or changes the duration shown in a case log.

purge.desc: Deletes a number of messages from the current channel.

clean.desc: Deletes bot messages sent by Helix in the current channel.

lock.desc: Prevents @everyone from sending messages in a channel.

unlock.desc: Allows @everyone to send messages in a locked channel again.

slowmode.desc: Sets a message cooldown in the current channel.

muterole.brief: Set or view the muted role for mutes.
muterole.desc: Defines which role Helix applies when muting members. Use this after creating your own Muted role.

role.brief: Add or remove a role from a user.
role.desc: Toggles a role for a user by mention, ID, or username.

modstats.brief: Show moderation stats for a mod.
modstats.desc: Displays a summary of moderation actions performed by a staff member.

log.brief: Set log channels for moderation, roles, messages, etc.
log.desc: Links server events to log channels. Use different channels for each log type.

logs.desc: Displays which channels are currently assigned for each log type.

gif.desc: Displays a random fun GIF in chat.
